display_long_description:
Ready to play? Just pop a cartridge into the floating console, and watch as your home transforms into thrilling new worlds: a high-tech spaceship, a medieval castle, or even a chaotic minigolf course. These games are designed to get you moving, making the most of your multi-room setup.

LUNAR BALL – Experience zero-gravity disc golf with room-spanning obstacles and goals.

CASTLE DEFENDER – Defend your castle from invaders with bow and arrow from your perch on the battlements.

I AM HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE – Traverse your home while dodging obstacles and your own past movements in this explosive challenge.

SNAKEMASTER – Classic snake, but in 3D, wrapping through your mapped home.

ULTRATOASTY – A tactical, high-intensity "time moves when you move" shooter.

VORTEX – Pilot a tiny spaceship in your hand and take down waves of enemies.

MECH MASTER – Build, gather, and command drones in this strategic RTS.

TINY GOLF – Navigate your home in this mini version of the classic sport.

*and more! *

Why just play when you can create? With the HOME BUILDER, you can redesign your home into any aesthetic you dream of. Picture your living room as a space station, your bedroom as a serene forest cabin, or your kitchen as a neon-lit diner. With the click of a button, it’s all possible. Now included Multiplayer!

Jump into the future of Mixed Reality. Whether you're defending a castle, customizing your dream home, or just having fun with friends, Custom Home Mapper turns your house into the ultimate playground.
